title: Piyush Goyal proposes indigenous Silicon Valley to promote startup ecosystem
description: Piyush Goyal, Minister of Commerce and Industry, has launched the Bharat Startup Knowledge Access Registry (Bhaskar) to foster collaboration among startups, investors, and government bodies. He envisions an indigenous Silicon Valley in India with dedicated townships for startups. The Bhaskar portal aims to centralize resources and support innovation within the startup ecosystem.
content: Piyush Goyal, the Minister of Commerce and Industry, has called for an indigenous Silicon Valley, a dedicated township for startups in India, at the launch of Bharat Startup Knowledge Access Registry (Bhaskar). It serves as a central hub for collaboration and exchange of ideas between startups, investors, service providers and government bodies.
cleaned_content: piyush goyal the minister of commerce and industry has called for an indigenous silicon valley a dedicated township for startups in india at the launch of bharat startup knowledge access registry bhaskar it serves as a central hub for collaboration and exchange of ideas between startups investors service providers and government bodies
